ygData.subject: Hmmmm...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I finally got the chance to play for a few hours after this morning s upgrade and here s what I ve noticed so far (limited spoilers): There s now a new
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I finally got the chance to play for a few hours after this morning's
upgrade and here's what I've noticed so far (limited spoilers):

There's now a new character in Freeport's Bard Guild, try talking to him.
:) (there, that's the spoiler--enjoy)

The boat between Freeport and Kaladim is running alot faster now (kinda a
shock--almost reported it as a bug after getting used to waiting 45
minutes for it).


I'm not sure if this is because of the update or not, but I'm having a
_heck_ of a time seeing other players. I almost ended up stealing
someone's kill because I didn't see them until after I had run up on the
monster in question and threw a dagger. Thankfully, I missed...and then
the player in question was in sight. I'll keep an eye on it later, when
I'm on at my more usual time--just in case I was suffering from lag. But
I thought I'd mention it anyway, in case others have had similar
problems.

Grei of Bristlebane
10th Octave (woohoo, finally)

--

Abandon the search for Truth; settle for a good fantasy.
